message.content:
{"id": "14943", "title": "Bug 14943 - Code Assist does not respect platform line ends", 
"description": "Bug 14943 - Code Assist does not respect platform line ends.", 
"OB": "When creating a new class and adding a method, if a local variable for an array is defined, the code assist feature does not respect the platform line ends.", 
"EB": "When creating a new class and adding a method, if a local variable for an array is defined, the code assist feature should respect the platform line ends.", 
"SR": "To fix this issue, the code assist feature needs to be modified to properly handle platform line ends when suggesting code completion for local variables in arrays."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '14943', 'title': 'Bug 14943Code Assist does not respect platform line ends', 'description': 'Bug 14943Code Assist does not respect platform line ends ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'I performed the following scenario:1. Created a new class2. Added a method.3. Defined a local variable for an array4. '}
